template.description: Single template (Both s3 and on premise).
template.name: static_data_transformer

entry.key: Permit Whitespace and Comments in Pattern

value.name: Permit Whitespace and Comments in Pattern

entry.key: Enable Literal Parsing of the Pattern

value.name: Enable Literal Parsing of the Pattern

entry.key: Permit Whitespace and Comments in Pattern
Enable Literal Parsing of the Pattern

entry.value: select * from (select a.ff_uuid,a.school_id,a.block_id,a.cluster_id,a.district_id, string_agg(a.exception_type,' and ') as exception_type from school_invalid_data as a group by a.ff_uuid,a.school_id,a.block_id,a.cluster_id,a.district_id) as data where data.ff_uuid='${files_uuid}'
delete from school_geo_master where school_latitude=0 or school_latitude is null or school_longitude =0 or school_longitude is null;
update log_summary set process_end_time = '${now():format("yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss")}' where ff_uuid= '${zip_identifier}'
Data validation: same id data validation of file:${filename} started
Duplicate mirror records found in file
Data validation file: ${filename} is not valid
Data validation, static data file: ${filename} columns validation started.
Data validation: Mirror data validation of file:${filename} completed and deleted the mirror data
Data validation file: ${filename} columns did not match.
null validation file: ${filename} null values are not found.
null validation file: ${filename} null values are found.
Duplicate same id records found in file

select data.*,shd.school_management_type from (select a.ff_uuid,a.school_id,a.block_id,a.cluster_id,a.district_id, string_agg(a.exception_type,' and ') as exception_type from school_invalid_data as a group by a.ff_uuid,a.school_id,a.block_id,a.cluster_id,a.district_id) as data left join (select sm.school_id,smm.school_management_type from school_master sm left join school_management_master smm on sm.school_management_type_id=smm.school_management_type_id) shd on data.school_id=shd.school_id where data.ff_uuid='${files_uuid}';
Total records, after removing duplicates in ${filename}: ${record.count}
Data validation: same id data validation of file:${filename}, same id records found
Data validation: Mirror data validation of file:${filename} started
update log_summary SET duplicate_records = (select sum(duplicate_records)+${hd}from log_summary where ff_uuid= '${files_uuid}') where ff_uuid= '${files_uuid}'
Data validation: same id data validation of file:${filename}, same id records found
Data type validation, file: ${filename} has invalid data type: invalid record=${count.invalid.lines} , Total records=${count.total.lines}
Data validation: Mirror data validation of file:${filename}, Mirror data found
